portfolio.title: Sister Friede
portfolio.catchyHeadline: Now, return from whence thou cam'st. Thou'st a place in that world, and that alone is cause to rejoice
portfolio.description: Friede is the eldest of the three sisters who founded the Sable Church of Londor, the others being Yuria and Liliane. Sister Friede is an Unkindled, suggesting that she attempted to link the First Flame or usurp it but failed, resulting in her being resurrected as ash.

portfolio.title: Oceiros, the Consumed King
portfolio.catchyHeadline: Ahh, you ignorant slaves. Finally taken notice have you? Of the power of my beloved Ocelotte, child of dragons.
portfolio.description: Oceiros was once the King of Lothric and was married to the Queen of Lothric, who was initially revered as the goddess of fertility and bounty, and Ocelotte was the youngest child the queen gave birth to.

portfolio.title: Lothric Princes
portfolio.catchyHeadline: Oh, dear, another dogged contender. Welcome, Unkindled One, purloiner of Cinders.
portfolio.description: Lothric is the way he is (frail, malformed, but magically powerful) as a result of his bloodline's long history of obsession with creating the perfect heir. When they failed to do so through conventional methods of conception and pure-breeding they resorted to more extreme means.

portfolio.title: Slave Knight Gael
portfolio.catchyHeadline: Now, return from whence thou cam'st. Thou'st a place in that world, and that alone is cause to rejoice
portfolio.description: He is the same missionary sent out by the Painting Woman to bring her the blood of the dark soul for her canvas. He originally helped the player begin the questline in the Cathedral of the Deep but does not seem to recall the player when met.

portfolio.title: Yuria Of Londor
portfolio.catchyHeadline: Thou'st forsworn the Lord's Mark. There is naught more to say. Farewell, our fleeting Lord.
portfolio.description: Yuria is one of three sisters which founded the Sable Church of Londor. The youngest sister's name is Liliane and the eldest's name is Elfriede.

portfolio.title: Firekeeper
portfolio.catchyHeadline: Welcome to the bonfire, Unkindled One.
portfolio.description: The Fire Keeper is an NPC in Dark Souls 3 located in the Firelink Shrine. She tends to the bonfire and assists the player character on their long and arduous journey through Lothric. Interacting with her allows the player to spend souls to level up, and later, heal the Dark Sigil using the Fire Keeper Soul.

portfolio.title: Shrine Handmaiden
portfolio.catchyHeadline: Ashen One, what woeful umbral ash is this. This barren dust, stuff of a fool, on't yield aught.
portfolio.description: She is the primary Merchant available to the player, and her inventory of items available for purchase can be expanded by giving her Umbral Ash scattered throughout Lothric.

portfolio.title: Hawkwood
portfolio.catchyHeadline: The poor wretched souls... Be they lord or legend, the curse shows no mercy. What a shame.
portfolio.description: Hawkwood is an NPC in Dark Souls 3. He is a fugitive from both Farron's Undead Legion and his own duties as Unkindled and admires the power of dragons.

portfolio.title: Lapp
portfolio.catchyHeadline: Oh, look at you, you've got your head screwed on correct. Fantastic, to meet a kindred spirit, on this godforsaken crag.
portfolio.description: Amnesiac Lapp,  is an NPC in Dark Souls 3. He is part of second DLC, The Ringed City. A man with a plate-armor helm you can encounter at Dreg Heap. He states that he's an amnesiac hollow and calls himself Lapp. Maybe he could be a reliable fellow.
